channel.title: Building on MISA++ Framework
channel.description: Recent content in Building on MISA++ Framework

item.title: Building on Windows
item.description: We tested building on Windows via the MSYS2 environment. Please note that the Visual Studio compiler is not supported due to missing OpenMP 3.x capabilities. Prerequisites Download and install MSYS2. Start MSYS2 (MinGW 64-bit) and update the packages by typing pacman -Syyu Let the process finish and close the terminal as instructed Restart MSYS2 (MinGW 64-bit) Using the superbuild script We provide fully automated scripts that installs MISA++ Core, the modules we provide, and all necessary dependencies.
